item.content: You move w/ hjkl (left, down, up, right)
You can also move diagonally via yubn, useful to get around boulders and such
Traverse stairs w/ '<' and '>'
To open a door press o next to it and then the movement key for the direction the door lies in
To kick open a door press k (or ^D) and then the movement key in the direction it is in, you may need to try multiple times
s searches for secrets around you, it usually takes several tries to find something hidden
You can search multiple times in succession by typing in a number and then pressing s
To pick up an object stand on top of it and press ','
Alot of items interact w/ each other and there are tons of ways to interact w/ objects in the world, experiment or look things up!
Press ';' and then move the cursor to a particular square to view the contents of that square
Open your inventory w/ i, you may view what you've picked up here
To eat an item press 'e' then its inventory number
To drop an item press 'd' then its inventory number (press 'D' to drop multiple amounts of that item)
To wield a weapon press 'w' then its inventory number
To wear armor press 'W' then its inventory number
To take off armor press 'T' then its inventory number
To quaff (drink) a potion, press 'q' then its inventory number
To attack a monster just move in its direction
You may set game options by pressing the 'O' key
Set 'autopickup' to true to automatically pick up items when you walk over them
